Name: [General] Basketball Tactical Board
Desc: When your squad is full, all squad members take <color=#2BAD00>12%</color> less DMG and deal <color=#2BAD00>12%</color> more DMG. Each missing member reduces this effect by 4%.
Desc2: Three basketball players work in unison, perfectly in sync with each other's movements. This is the basis for the triangular combat technique.
